sentences.en: By 1945 that cancer had metastasized all through the Fatherland.
sentences.cn: 到了一九四五年,即癌症已经扩散到了祖国各地.

sentences.en: Everything belongs to the fatherland when fatherland is in danger.
sentences.cn: 当祖国危急时,每个东西都属于祖国.

sentences.en: Everything belongs to the fatherland when the fatherland is in danger.
sentences.cn: 当祖国面临危险时,一切都是属于祖国的.

sentences.en: One, inured to misfortune by her fatherland.
sentences.cn: 有的人, 祖国使她饱经灾难.

sentences.en: Then will all the earth be your fatherland, and all your work and effort spread forth blessings.
sentences.cn: 那么普天之下到处都是你们的祖国，你们所有的工作和努力都会遍地开花，造福天下。

sentences.en: They were doing everything they could to help the fatherland.
sentences.cn: 他们尽其所能资助他们的祖国.

sentences.en: They were willing to serve the fatherland in its hour of need.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意在祖国需要的时候为她效力。

sentences.en: You must love everything that contributes to the glory and honour of the fatherland.
sentences.cn: 你一定要热爱那些,能为祖国增添光荣和辉煌的事物

trans.tran_en: the place where someone or their family was born
